content: onnaam shushroosha
(eniyono-masheehadaakhu)

aadaam makkal-kkuththaanam
vaagdattham che-ython mashihaa
nin sharanatthil nidrithayaam
daasikkekanamu-ththaa-nam.

Nin karunaasa-nkethatthil
nidraavashayaam-sodariye
nin mahimodaya divasatthil
nin kaarunyam kaa-tte-nam.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam ...

sthuthi thrithvatthin-marmmamathaam
thaathannum than-thanayannum
haaleluyyaa nirmmalanaam
roohaaykkum paatum--ngal.
(kukkiliyon-anchaamniram)

kanmizhikaluyarttheetunnen svarggaalayane! - haale…
svaami samaksham-daasan pol

krupa njangalilulavaavolam thirusannidhiyil- haale…
krupa cheyyuka naathaa! Krupa cheyka.
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam…
(ekbo-hesu aaloho)
(mashihaa jeevicchezhunnettu-enna reethi)

mruthinilayam-dyvam pooki
mruthiyavane-nihanicchilla.
Avane ul-kkonda parethar
jeevan poo-ndaanandikkum.
sthaumenkaalos…
prumiyon
(thakptho)

naturaathriyilulavaayitumaa
mahaneeyaddhuvani kettituvaan
naathaa! Nokkippaarkkunnen
sambhramakaramaam velayathil.

Yeshumahaaraajaavin്re
vijayakkoti udayam cheyyum
aa nimishatthil krobenmaar
meekhaayel thotteenmaar

ennee vathsalasamghatthin
therinmelavaneri varum
annerattheritheeppuzhayil
bheekarasimhaasanamuyarum.

Nithyan balavaan than thanayan
balavaanugran bheethikaran
vaanum paarum nirayunnon
karmmangalkkanusruthamaarkkum

prathidaanam nalkeetunnon
lokaadheeshan vidhinaathan
thal peedtatthilirunneetum
rakshakane! Attharunatthil

cheyyanamennotu kaarunyam
jeevamayaa! Devaadheeshaa
eppol njaanavitettheetum
kaanum nin mukhameppol njaan

ennu vichaaricchennaathmam
ninne prathi daahikkunnu.
moriyo…
ethro
(kolo-kukkoyo)

patuvruddhathayil kaanaanil-mruthayaam saaraaye
isahaakkotu chernnabraaham-cheythaan samskaaram
/tnin sharanatthil-maranamatanjole
/taathmokthikalaal samskaaram cheyvoo
naathaa! Sthuthiyennevamival-nyaaya-ttheerppin naal
ninvalamaayu ninnucchatthil-ghoshiccheetenam /thaale... U haale...
baarekmor. Shubaho menaolam ...

sathvaramruthiyil haavaathan-makale! Kezhalle
mannanumezhayumikkaasaa-paanam cheyyenam
/tmoraan thante-maareennundaaya
/tjeevanajalavum-paavana ninavum nin
amgangalil ninneritheeyin -jvaalakale neekkum
paathakamukthiye nee neti-kartthaave! Sthothram
/thaale... Ennaaghoshikkum.
(madaroshod-slekkulasaleebo)

dhanyan sahaje! Mruthiyaal ni-nne neekki
ka-nnikaloppam-manavarayil-paarppicchon.

Haa! Namme vilikkunnazhalaal-haavamakal
tha-n maranadine-vyatha nammalkkuyarunnu
/tthalpaapam-mochiccheetaname
/tsatthamarum-dhaarmmikarum sahitham
modamezhum-manavarayil-cherkkaname-neeyivale.

Va-thsalasahaje maranatthaal-njangalil ni-
nee-naal nee ver-pettathinaal karayaruthe.
/tnee mahimaa-votuththaanatthin
/tdivasatthil-kabareennezhunnelkkum
shaashvathamaam lokatthil-puru thejasaniyum nee.

Aa-nandippaan-bhaagyatthin maniyarayil
sam-rakshakane!-daasiye nee-ettaname
/tdhaarmmikarum nirmmalamaanasarum
/tchernnivalaa-modippaan naathaa!
Nin sleebaa-aapatthil-paalamathaay-theeraname.
moriyo
(maar yaakkobinte bovuso)

dy-vaathmajane! Shaashvatharaajyatthaashvaasam nin
daa-sikkekuka dhaarmmika shuddhanmaarotoppam.

Ni-n kyppaniyaam manninmelanpundaakenam
u-ththaanatthil hatharoopatthe puthuthaakkenam.

Ni-n raajyatthil puthuthaayivalavakaasham neti-
ttaa-thmeeyanmaaroppam ninne vaazhttheetatte.

Paa-thaalatthil maranam koottiyorasthikkunni-
nne-kuka jeevan krupayaal ninne sthothram cheyyum.

Ka-mpikal patthum mruthyu thakartthiha maunam poondo-
ree-veenayilen naathaa! Kaattuka sahathaapam nee.

Kallarayinnum mruthare etteettuththaanatthil
the-jomayamaam vasthram nalkunnone! Sthothram.
